Articles.Content: I like the hierarchy of the way the part menu is set up in the VAB, but I found myself having to mouse over a lot of icons to read the description. The Iconography is vague, lack of colors and details on different parts and side icons make it hard to tell at a glance what I'm looking at, whereas in KSP 1, the iconography made it very easy to tell just by looking at it, what category I'm clicking on, what part I'm selecting etc.
